ygData.subject: Re: Enthrall change or is it just me?
ygData.msgSnippet: You should check my page more often ;p I included the adjusted recast times in my post on the patch.  Can view it here:
ygData.messageBody:
You should check my page more often ;p

I included the adjusted recast times in my post on the patch. Can view it
here: http://eq.castersrealm.com/viewarticle.asp?Article=507

- Baelish.
----- Original Message -----
From: "Michael Cummins" <pakrat77@...>
To: <eqenchanters@onelist.com>
Sent: Friday, December 10, 1999 11:22 PM
Subject: Re: [eqenchanters] Enthrall change or is it just me?


> From: "Michael Cummins" <pakrat77@...>
>
> didn't they say in the patch message that that whole line of spells had
it's
> recast turned down?
>
> ----- Original Message -----
> From: Garett <osmosis@...>
> To: <eqenchanters@onelist.com>
> Sent: Friday, December 10, 1999 1:38 AM
> Subject: [eqenchanters] Enthrall change or is it just me?
>
>
> > From: "Garett" <osmosis@...>
> >
> > Lately enthrall seems to have a much faster recast time. I jus turned
32
> so
> > I dont know if that has anything to do with it, but it went from a 5
> second
> > recharge to a one second recharge. Can anyone else confirm this?
> >
> > Cogg - Rallos Zek
> >
> > >
>
> >
